title: Collaborative Situated Learning Expert Training Program for Mobile Learning Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to learn how to apply mobile learning objects (Reusable Learning Objects) to real work situations

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three instructional design strategies for integrating mobile-based reusable learning objects into real work scenarios
Learners can design mobile learning modules using the Collaborative Situated Activity Learning (CSAM) framework
Learners can write self-reflection reports based on the mTSES evaluating self-efficacy when utilizing mobile learning tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
